channel.title: Pirated GTA IV Leaked Early Online
channel.description:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oQ2L7dXFmrQ]GTA 4 - Gameplay video!!![/url] !!! Another one: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CppkfqSaoNE [url=http://kotaku.com/383017/pirated-gta-iv-leaked-early-online] Pirated GTA IV Leaked Early Online [/url]
At around 11:50am Greenwich Mean Time, the PAL version of Grand Theft Auto IV for the Xbox 360 was ripped and leaked to various torrent sites by a ground called iCON. This would of course enable burning a copy for the home console. Meanwhile, the NTSC version is expected within the next 48 hours. YouTube clips have been popping up online of the game's opening and early missions — but as of posting, many of the clips have been taken down. The retail release is a mere six days away. This isn't the first GTA game leaked as San Andreas was as well. And it was leaked a week before, too. We haven't verified whether the 6.32 GB file really is the full game, but there are plenty of listings on torrent sites now and we contacted Rockstar for comment.
[img]http://kotaku.com/assets/resources/2008/04/icongta4.JPG[/img] If you want to watch gta 4 gameplay vids go on youtube and search "gta 4" sort by date The vids are being taken down fast by rockstar

item.title: Pirated GTA IV Leaked Early Online
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:21, topic:201942”]EDIT:
http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=RD6ZdqBiEpo
Wow. I do not think I will ever be able to play an older GTA ever again :([/quote]

This video is no longer available due to a copyright claim by Take 2 Games
Looks like they are removing all game play vids untill 29th.

Read full topic

item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:19, topic:201942”]Well the NTSC version was leaked way earlier today as well…

I’m playing it right now =][/quote]
How is it?
I think I might just try some online junk to get a 360/ps3, I’m anxious to play it!
EDIT:
http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=RD6ZdqBiEpo
Wow. I do not think I will ever be able to play an older GTA ever again

item.title: Pirated GTA IV Leaked Early Online
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

davidude36:

Btw am I right in thinking the PAL version is the version which has been edited to take bad stuff out of it (Like the aus version).

No. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PAL http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NTSC

Meaning if you live in the USA, Canada, or Japan (maybe others too?) your TV is NTSC and not PAL and therefore you can’t use this.

Read full topic

Pirated GTA IV Leaked Early Online

At around 11:50am Greenwich Mean Time, the PAL version of Grand Theft Auto IV for the Xbox 360 was ripped and leaked to various torrent sites by a ground called iCON. This would of course enable burning a copy for the home console. Meanwhile, the NTSC version is expected within the next 48 hours. YouTube clips have been popping up online of the game's opening and early missions — but as of posting, many of the clips have been taken down. The retail release is a mere six days away. This isn't the first GTA game leaked as San Andreas was as well. And it was leaked a week before, too.

We haven’t verified whether the 6.32 GB file really is the full game, but there are plenty of listings on torrent sites now and we contacted Rockstar for comment.

The vids are being taken down fast by rockstar
